quest.name: A Shelltered Eggsistence
journal:
Nonotta is practically champing at the bit to see you dressed in your new Hatching–tide outfit.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Nonotta and Riggy have prepared a complex conundrum for you and Jihli to solve as part of Hatching–tide. Nonotta also insists that you don the jacket she has designed especially for the event─which upon closer inspection you notice features an enormous hood complete with long, dangling attachments modeled after a spriggan's ears. It seems you will need to be attired to her satisfaction before she will allow you to begin the egg hunt.

※Please note that you will not be able to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, check the Lodestone.

Clothed as Nonotta instructed, you submit yourself for her inspection. Though no explanation as to the supposed necessity of the garment is forthcoming, it at least serves the function of delighting her. She bids you go forth in search of three spriggans, who between them hold the key to unlocking the mystery she and Riggy have devised.

Scouring the various nooks and crannies of New Gridania, you eventually locate the three spriggans, who are quick to give up their clues. They eagerly offer brief statements relating to the numbers one, two, and three, the meaning of which is for the most part unclear at this point. Meanwhile, Jihli stares intently at the map that Nonotta has provided, in the hope that the information you have gathered will help solve the Hatching–tide puzzle.

Now that the necessary pieces are ostensibly in place, Nonotta divulges the password─Egg Hunt─which presumably will lead you to the gilded tourmaline egg when uttered in the correct location. Whether you and Jihli are able to find the place in question is another matter, as the small problem of unraveling the many-layered enigma yet remains.

You cleverly deduce that Mother Miounne is the one charged with safeguarding the gilded tourmaline egg, and she relinquishes your prize as per her agreement with Nonotta. The item in question is rather colorful, and a slight rustling sound comes from inside when it is shaken. You and Jihli decide that rather than quibbling over the object's true nature, you should return it to Nonotta and Riggy and put their puzzle to bed.

Nonotta praises you and Jihli for having overcome the challenge she had posed, or at least the first part of it. She wastes no time in revealing that this was merely a precursor, and the true conundrum is yet to come. The source of the rustling from inside the gilded tourmaline egg turns out to be another map, filling Jihli with a great sense of apprehension that her cognitive abilities will be pushed to their limits and beyond. Only time will tell if yours are up to the task.
objectives: Don a spriggan jacket and speak with Nonotta.
With the chat mode in Say, enter “Egg Hunt” in the correct location to discover the gilded tourmaline egg.
Deliver the gilded tourmaline egg to Nonotta.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you choose to undertake this quest, know that guidance from the journal, duty list, and map will be limited. You will need to read the text carefully and decipher the clues to determine your course of action.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: With that Archon egg out there waiting for you, there's no time like the present to break in your new spriggan jacket. I'm sure you'll agree that the tailoring is eggceptional!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With your brand-new spriggan jacket equipped and your mind primed for the trials ahead, speak with Nonotta again.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you do not have a spriggan jacket in your possession, you can purchase one from the Dreamer at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: With that Archon egg out there waiting for you, there's no time like the present to break in your new spriggan jacket. I'm sure you'll agree that the tailoring is eggceptional!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With your brand-new spriggan jacket equipped and your mind primed for the trials ahead, speak with Nonotta again.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you do not have a spriggan jacket in your possession, you can purchase one from the Dreamer at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Magnificent! Let the hunt begin!

dialogue.name: RIGGY
dialogue.text: Friend ready for eggy! Ready, ready, readyyy!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: If you manage to find the gilded tourmaline egg, bring it to me for inspection. I'll know if you try to fob me off with a fake one!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: There will be no need for that─we shall find that egg in no time!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Don't forget, you'll need to speak with all three spriggans to stand a chance of reaching the prize.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Forename, I shall leave locating the spriggans to you. In the meantime, I will attempt to make some sense of this map. Let us meet back here once we have a lead in our search for the egg.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: I have a map for you, too. Without giving too much away, I should point out that this holds the key to the whole mystery.

dialogue.name: RIGGY
dialogue.text: Riggy love mystery!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Since I am normally the one organizing these kinds of events, being able to participate makes a welcome change!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use the crumpled cartograph and hints provided to discover the location of the gilded tourmaline egg.

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN03203
dialogue.text: Me first! Me first!

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN03203
dialogue.text: Second best! Beeest!

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN03203
dialogue.text: Third foreveeer!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Have you found the spriggans yet?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: We should reconvene once we have enough information to form a hypothesis as to the egg's location.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: I recommend finding the spriggans first and making a note of where you found them. You never know─it could be important!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: You have found all three spriggans? Jolly good! What did they say?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: First, second, third? They must be referring to some kind of order.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: But how is it linked to the writing on the map?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Nonotta, are there any further clues for us to find?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: No, that's all you get, I'm afraid!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: By the Twelve! I cannot make head nor tail of this!

dialogue.name: RIGGY
dialogue.text: Oh! Oh! Riggy know! Can Riggy say?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Oh, pipe down, would you? Forename, Jihli, once you have the answer, go to where you suspect the egg lies and call out “Egg Hunt” in a nice, big voice!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use the information gleaned from the three spriggans and the clues on the map to determine the gilded tourmaline egg's whereabouts.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, enter “Egg Hunt” while standing in the correct location to discover the item. With it in your possession, speak with Nonotta.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you require further hints, speak with Jihli Aliapoh.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Between the two of you, I'm sure you can figure it out!

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN03203
dialogue.text: Me first! Me first!

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN03203
dialogue.text: Second best! Beeest!

dialogue.name: SPRIGAN03203
dialogue.text: Third foreveeer!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Egg Hunt

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Are you here for one of Mother's famous eel pies?

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Well, well. It seems Nonotta and Riggy have met their match.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: The egg... It is here...correct?

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: An egg, is it? I must say, it does feel somewhat artificial, but I suppose it's the right shape. In any case, it's now the property of the one who came here and uttered the password.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Mother Miounne certainly has a point about it being strange. And is it my imagination, or did I hear a slight rustling sound from inside?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: What I'm most interested in, though, is seeing Nonotta and Riggy's faces when they realize we have solved the mystery!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I feel as though we are slowly getting closer to the answer...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Would you like Jihli to share her thoughts?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: While these letters are clearly not Eorzean, they are somewhat similar. It is not too hard to decipher them, but simply reading them from left to right reveals nothing but gibberish.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Obviously, their positioning in relation to the map below is vital in understanding the puzzle.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Would you like Jihli to share more of her thoughts?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Perhaps we have overlooked something?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Hmm... The three spriggans must be linked to these letters in some fashion.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Can you remember where you found them?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Would you like Jihli to share yet more of her thoughts?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Each of the spriggans mentioned something about first, second, or third, yes?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Hmm... My guess is that this is probably as important, if not more so, than their locations. With that in mind, let's take another look at the map!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Our three furry friends were sent to these positions, and this is how their numbers are distributed.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Yes, things seem much clearer now.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Would you like Jihli to share even more of her thoughts?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Initially I thought the positions of the spriggans would indicate which letters reveal the answer...

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: ...but none of them are in the same places. As you can see, they are all slightly off. So much for that idea!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I wonder if the spriggans are trying to indicate a course of some sort?

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: If I move my finger from one point to the next... Hmm? 'Tis a name I know very well indeed. Now we need only find her...

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: So, you think you've found the answer? You'll still need to use the password, though. It's “Egg Hunt” in case you forgot!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, enter “Egg Hunt” while standing in the correct location to discover the gilded tourmaline egg. With it in your possession, speak with Nonotta.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: So, have you got something for me?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ho ho! Congratulations to you both for getting this far.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Hmm? You mean to say...

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Yes, finding the gilded tourmaline egg was only the beginning! For inside it is...another map! This time, the prize you seek is a gilded topaz egg.

dialogue.name: RIGGY
dialogue.text: Very pretty! Pretty, prettyyy!

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Oh dear... I thought I had already surpassed the limits of my mental faculties. If these puzzles get any more difficult, I fear my head shall explode!

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: I shan't pretend that I understand what you're all doing. Something to do with Hatching–tide, I presume? As long as you're enjoying yourselves, that's the most important thing.

dialogue.name: JIHLIALIAPOH
dialogue.text: I knew we would find the egg!
